error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'minutes_per_hour' (60) was used instead of 'valerie_skips_per_minute' (80).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 1950
Roberto skips 70 times per minute because 4200 / 60 = <<4200/60=70>>70.
Together they skip 130 times a minute.
They will skip 1950 times because 130 x 15 = <<130*15=1950>>1950
